junior.title: NodeJs Basics
junior.projectDescription: Build a simple web server using Node.js. Use the HTTP module to create a server that listens on a port and returns Hello, World! to any request.

junior.title: HTTP and Express.js
junior.projectDescription: Build a simple RESTful API using Express.js. Use the express module to create a server that listens on a port and responds to GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests. Use MongoDB to store and retrieve data.

junior.title: MongoDB and Mongoose.js
junior.projectDescription: Build a simple e-commerce RESTful API that uses MongoDB as its backend database. Implement CRUD operations for the application's data, and add support for basic text search using MongoDB's text search functionality.

junior.title: Testing and Debugging
junior.projectDescription: Write automated tests for the RESTful API developed in the previous milestone using Mocha and Chai

entrylevel.title: Advanced HTTP and Express.js
entrylevel.projectDescription: Build a real-time chat application that uses WebSockets and Passport.js for authentication.

entrylevel.title: Relational Databases and Sequelize.js
entrylevel.projectDescription: Build a RESTful API that uses Sequelize.js to interact with a MySQL or PostgreSQL database

entrylevel.title: Security and Performance
entrylevel.projectDescription: Implement security measures and performance optimizations for the RESTful API developed in the previous milestone

advanced.title: Advanced Concepts in Node.js
advanced.projectDescription: Build a Node.js application that uses streams, child processes, and clustering to handle large amounts of data efficiently and concurrently

advanced.title: Advanced Database Management
advanced.projectDescription: Design and implement a data warehouse for a large retail chain.- integrate data from multiple sources- provide complex reporting and analysis capability.- Implement security measures and performance optimizations

advanced.title: Advanced Performance and Scalability
advanced.projectDescription: Build a scalable and performant microservices architecture with Node.js, Docker, Redis, and RabbitMQ. Implement CRUD operations for the service's data, and add support for data pagination, filtering, and sorting.

advanced.title: Testing and Debugging
advanced.projectDescription: Write automated tests for the RESTful API developed in the previous milestone using Mocha and Chai

junior.title: Introduction to Product Design
junior.projectDescription: Sketch 10 different product ideas. It can be on either desktop or mobile.

junior.title: User Research and Understanding User Needs
junior.projectDescription: Conduct a user interview and create a user persona

junior.title: Product Design Tools
junior.projectDescription: Create a wireframe using a product design tool

junior.title: Prototyping and Testing
junior.projectDescription: Create and test a prototype with users

junior.title: Introduction to Hand-Off and Collaboration
junior.projectDescription: Create a clear hand-off process document outlining the key steps and responsibilities involved in transferring design between different teams and stages.

junior.title: Design Principles and Elements
junior.projectDescription: Create a design using the principles and elements learned

junior.title: Designing for Different Platforms
junior.projectDescription: Design an online store for a specific platform (e.g. mobile app)

entrylevel.title: Collaborating with Developers
entrylevel.projectDescription: Collaborate with developers to ensure design decisions can be implemented within technical constraints.Conduct a retrospective to identify areas for improvement in the design and development process.

entrylevel.title: Visual Design
entrylevel.projectDescription: Design a style guide that includes typography, color palette, and iconography for a new product or feature.Implement the design system in a project by creating components and style guides.

entrylevel.title: Interaction Design
entrylevel.projectDescription: Create low-fidelity wireframes to outline the layout and functionality of a feature or product.

entrylevel.title: User-Centered Design
entrylevel.projectDescription: Conduct user interviews to understand their needs and pain points.Create user personas based on research findings.

advanced.title: User Research and Design
advanced.projectDescription: Conduct user research and create user personas, user scenarios, and wireframes for a product design project

advanced.title: Visual Design and Interaction Design
advanced.projectDescription: Create a visual design project that incorporates responsive design and micro-interactions.

advanced.title: Design Collaboration and Leadership
advanced.projectDescription: Lead a design project and facilitate a design thinking workshop.

advanced.title: Design Principles and Fundamentals
advanced.projectDescription: Create a visual design project that applies the principles of design thinking, visual hierarchy, and grid systems.

junior.title: HYPERTEXT MARKUP LANGUAGE
junior.projectDescription: :Build a simple personal website using HTML

junior.title: CASCADING STYLE SHEETS (CSS)
junior.projectDescription: s:Build a simple webpage using HTML and CSSCreate a form using HTML and CSSBuild a responsive webpage using HTML and CSS

junior.title: JAVASCRIPT
junior.projectDescription: s:Add interactivity to a webpage using JavaScriptCreate a calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

entrylevel.title: Advanced CSS
entrylevel.projectDescription: s:Build a webpage using a CSS frameworkImplement animations and transitions using CSSBuild a responsive webpage using CSS grid and/or flexbox

entrylevel.title: JAVASCRIPT FRAMEWORK
entrylevel.projectDescription: s:Build a simple web application using a JavaScript framework

intermediate.title: PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION
intermediate.projectDescription: Build an accessible webpage or application that meets WCAG guidelines

intermediate.title: MODERN WEB DEVELOPMENT TECHNIQUES
intermediate.projectDescription: Build a modern web application using PWA, serverless architecture, and/or GraphQLDeploy a web application using CI/CD pipeline and serverless computing platform

advanced.title: ADVANCED JAVASCRIPT
advanced.projectDescription: Write advanced JavaScript using techniques like Promises, Async/Await, Generators, and Iterators

advanced.title: TESTING AND DEBUGGING
advanced.projectDescription: Write comprehensive unit tests using Jest and end-to-end tests using CypressDebug complex web applications using Chrome DevTools

advanced.title: WEB ACCESSIBILITY
advanced.projectDescription: Build and deploy an accessible web application that follows the latest WCAG guidelines and uses semantic HTML and ARIA attributes
